system.effect: As an Extended Action can make +20 Tech-use check to deploy mines 4x4x4 VU Area behind the ship. Bay has room for 3 deployements before requiring Upkeep Test at suitable spaceport. Minefields can't overlap. If minelayer bay is damaged while mines are in it, 50% chance it is destroyed and vessel takes a Critical hit (roll 1d10 for result).
